entries.title: Ronaldo says he joined Saudi Arabian football club after he 'won everything' in Europe
entries.description: Christiano Ronaldo has declared in Europe he has "won everything" as he was unveiled with Saudi Arabia club Al Nassr.

entries.title: FIFA boss 'dismayed' after coming under fire for taking selfie near Pele's open coffin
entries.description: FIFA president Gianni Infantino has said he is "dismayed" after he was criticised for taking a selfie near Pele's body as he lay in state.

entries.title: Family releases statement after NFL player's heart attack on pitch
entries.description: The family of an American football player who suffered a cardiac arrest during an NFL game have asked supporters to keep him in their prayers.

entries.title: Pele's coffin carried through streets of Santos as public bid final farewell to football legend
entries.description: The coffin of football legend Pele has been carried through the streets of Santos in Brazil as the public paid their final respects to the sporting icon.

entries.title: Couple call 911 to get help to move belongings from home they were burgling
entries.description: Two people in Florida were arrested after one of them made a 911 call to get help moving their belongings from a home they were burgling, authorities said.

entries.title: Christian graves vandalised in Jerusalem cemetery
entries.description: More than 30 Christian graves have been vandalised in a Jerusalem cemetery - some of them British Commonwealth War Graves.

entries.title: Iranian chess player who competed without hijab 'lands in Spain after threats'
entries.description: An Iranian chess player who competed without a hijab has arrived in Spain after being warned not to return home, according to a source close to her.

entries.title: Protests in India after woman dies after being dragged for miles in hit-and-run
entries.description: The death of a 20-year-old woman in India who was dragged for miles after being hit by a car has led to outcry and protests.

entries.title: Rapper Gangsta Boo - who collaborated with Eminem, OutKast and more - dies aged 43
entries.description: Rapper Gangsta Boo, a former member of the hip-hop group Three 6 Mafia, has died at the age of 43.

entries.title: Japan to offer families £6,394 per child to move out of Tokyo
entries.description: Japan is set to offer families up to £6,394 per child to move out of Tokyo as part of efforts to combat population concentration in the capital.

entries.title: Ski resorts forced to shut as Europe starts new year with record-breaking temperatures
entries.description: Unseasonably warm conditions and sparse snowfall has forced some low-level ski resorts to shut in recent days - as Europe started the new year with record-breaking temperatures.

entries.title: China threatens retaliation over COVID-19 testing rules for travellers
entries.description: Beijing has threatened to retaliate against countries who are imposing COVID-19 testing requirements on arrivals from China.

entries.title: Major French film awards ban anyone accused of sexual assault from ceremony
entries.description: Anyone accused of sexual assault will not be allowed to attend the Cesar film awards ceremony in France, organisers have announced.

entries.title: From a new player in electric cars to the next generation of VR - what to expect from the world's biggest tech event
entries.description: Never mind Adele's residency, it's the gadgets of the future that will be taking Las Vegas by storm this week.

entries.title: Controversial far-right Israeli minister accused of 'deliberate provocation' after mosque visit
entries.description: The controversial far-right Israeli politician Itamar Ben-Gvir has visited Al Aqsa compound in Jerusalem on Tuesday, in a move that could dramatically inflame tensions in the region.

entries.title: Politicians jailed after assaulting pregnant colleague in Senegalese parliament brawl
entries.description: Two Senegalese politicians have been sentenced to six months in jail after assaulting a pregnant colleague during a parliamentary brawl.

entries.title: Fans in their thousands queue to see hero Pele's coffin - ahead of its unusual final resting place
entries.description: Edson Arantes do Nascimento wasn't born here, and he didn't die here.
